K12bsu041_u:18256: yasyāṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vālukāmayaṃ vā pūrṇamāsyāṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:18257: tatraiva paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sphaṭīkamaṇimṛṇmayā vā dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvajjvalatīti /
K12bsu041_u:18259: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣaṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:18260: prātihārakapakṣapūrṇamāsyāṃ vidhivat pūjāṃ kṛtvā pradīpamālāṃ ca udārāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇahastena dhvajaṃ śuklavastrāvalambitaṃ gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalati /
K12bsu041_u:18263: prātihārakapakṣe pūrṇamāsyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavatyā prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ
K12bsu041_u:18264: sugandhagandhaiḥ pralipya sugandhapuṣpamālābhiḥ veṣṭayitvā vāmahastena gṛhya paryaṅkopaviṣṭastāvajjaped yāvajjvalati /
K12bsu041_u:18268: kumārīṃ prāsādikāṃ susnātālaṅkṛtāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vāmahastena gṛhya sthitastāvajjaped yāvat tayā saha jvalati
K12bsu041_u:18270: ekaliṅgasyopari hastaṃ datvā tāvajjaped yāvat sakhāyā na paśyanti /
K12bsu041_u:18272: trayodaśyāṃ candragrahe sūryagrahe vā haritālaṃ bodhivṛkṣapatrāntaritaṃ kṛtvā maheśvarāyatane sadhātuke caityai tāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati /
K12bsu041_u:18274: kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ samudrataṭe vṛkṣamūle sahasraṃ japet trisandhyaṃ saptarātram /
K12bsu041_u:18279: tato hastaśirasi kṛtaṃ tasyopari upaviṣṭa aṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:18282: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā vaśīkartukāmaḥ tasya madhūcchiṣṭakena pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā nirdhūmāṅgāreṣu kṣipet saptarātraṃ sa vaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18283: vastrakāmaḥ śvetapuṣpāṇāṃ aparimarditānāṃ sakṛt parijapya udake kṣipet saptarātram /
K12bsu041_u:18289: tenaiva cābhyakto jalaṃ praviśati stambhito bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18291: āyasaṃ pradeśamātraṃ khaḍgaṃ kṛtvā sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā aśvatthapatraiḥ pradakṣiṇāvarttaiḥ khaḍgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalita iti /
K12bsu041_u:18294: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ
K12bsu041_u:18295: bhikṣaṃ bhojya manaḥśilāyāṃ bhūmau padmaṃ śatapatraṃ lekhya padmakarṇikāyāṃ upaviśya
K12bsu041_u:18299: yāvantaḥ satvāṃ paśyati yaiśca dṛśyate taiḥ sārdhaṃ gacchati /
K12bsu041_u:18308: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā vaśīkartukāmena paṭasyāgrataḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmārabhya (Vaidya 525)
K12bsu041_u:18312: tāmevāṣṭamīmārabhya gorocanā trisandhyaṃ aṣṭaśatikena japed yāvadekādaśī /
K12bsu041_u:18313: tena tilakaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ vīkṣyati sa vaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18314: yadicche dārakadārikāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ siddhārthakānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18315: tāsāṃ pādapāsuṃ gṛhya puttalikāṃ kṛtvā yasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ karoti sa vaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18316: meghārthinā gavyaghṛtaṃ gṛhya candragrahe sūryagrahe vā tāmrabhājane prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
K12bsu041_u:18317: ūṣmāyamāne śrutidharo 'yaṃ yaṃ śṛṇoti taṃ gṛhṇāti /
K12bsu041_u:18330: kulapatiṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ arkasamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptarātram /
K12bsu041_u:18332: lokapatyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ dūrvāpravālānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātraṃ trisandhyam /
K12bsu041_u:18334: āryasaṅghaṃ vaśīkartukāmena arkapuṣpāṇāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ nivedayet saptarātram /
K12bsu041_u:18340: paṭasyāgrataḥ arkakāṣṭhasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhya sahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18342: śatruvaśīkaraṇe poṣadhikaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ trisandhyaṃ rājasarṣapāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptāham /
K12bsu041_u:18348: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā mṛtakapuruṣaṃ akṣatāṅgaṃ gṛhya snānālaṅkṛtaṃ kṛtvā sugandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya vāmapādenorasimākramya mastake āhantavyaḥ /
K12bsu041_u:18354: taṃ śirasi kaṇṭhe vā kṛtvā anyatra vā baddhvā yaṃ cintayati taṃ prādurbhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18355: śuklapratipadamārabhya ahorātroṣitaḥ samudragāminiṃ nadīṃ aṃsamātramudakamavatīrya jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ daśasahasrāṇi pravāhayet /
K12bsu041_u:18358: śuklapratipadamārabhya samudragāminyā nadyā padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi nivedayet saptarātram /
K12bsu041_u:18360: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tāmeva nadīmavatīrya puṣpāṇāṃ daśasahasrāṇi pravāhayet saptāham /
K12bsu041_u:18362: aśokapuṣpaiḥ caṇakamātrāṃ guṭikāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātram /
K12bsu041_u:18365: suvarṇasahasraṃ labhate aśokaguṭikāvyatimiśraiḥ apāmārgatandulaiḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ tryaktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi (Vaidya 526) juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18367: rājānaṃ samantriṇaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ aśokasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya aśokapuṣpāṇāmeva dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśa sahasrāṇi juhuyāt
K12bsu041_u:18369: paṭasyāgrataḥ agniṃ prajvālya apāmārgasamidbhiḥ śatapuṣpāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18376: sadhātuke caitye nadītaṭe vā parvate vā paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya padmānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18389: lavaṇamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ chitvā chitvā juhuyāt aṣṭasahasram /
K12bsu041_u:18390: yamicchati sa vaśo bhavati strī vā puruṣo vā /
K12bsu041_u:18391: ubhayārdraṃ hastasarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt divasatrayam /
K12bsu041_u:18393: udake ekapādaṃ prakṣipya sthale eka eva tāvajjped yāvadudakasthaṃ pādaṃ laghurbhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18397: brāhmīguḍūcīpippalīcūrṇaṃ samabhāgāni kṛtvā madhunā sahāryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ ekaviṃśativārān parijapya lihet saptāham /
K12bsu041_u:18401: paṭasyāgrataḥ pratimāyā vā aṣṭasahasraṃ japaṃ kṛtvā paścāt pibet /
K12bsu041_u:18409: bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ ye spṛśanti te sarve vaśyā bhavanti /
K12bsu041_u:18410: anenaiva mantreṇa śastrāhatasya puruṣasya tailamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritena mrakṣayed vraṇo naśyati /
K12bsu041_u:18412: anena loṣṭaṃ parijapya saptavārāṃ jale prakṣipet /
K12bsu041_u:18416: candragrahe sadhātuke caitye guñjānāṃ ślakṣṇacūrṇīkṛtānāṃ dhṛtamadhumiśrā guḍikāṃ kārayet /
K12bsu041_u:18421: śuklapratipadamārabhya trirātroṣitaḥ aśvatthapatravṛkṣasyādhastāda yūthikākalikānāṃ ghṛtadadhikṣīrābhyaktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18423: atha na siddhyati karmakuryāt rūpakaśataṃ labhate paśyati vā piśācajvarabhūtagrahavināśakaṃ sūtreṇa mokṣayati /
K12bsu041_u:18424: nāryā aprasavamānāyā tailamaṣṭaśataṃ parijapya nābhiṃ kaṭipradeśaṃ vā mrakṣayet /
K12bsu041_u:18426: kumbhīradhāraṇaṃ loṣṭaśatābhimantritena anantāvetasībrāhmīvacābṛhatīmadhusaṃyuktā sadhātuke caitye candramapaśyatā (Vaidya 527)
K12bsu041_u:18430: saṅgrāme pratisarāṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā granthiṃ haste badhvā ahatabalo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18432: samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya gatvā kṣīrayāvakāhāreṇa pakṣamupoṣya vikasitānāṃ śvetapadmānāṃ udake nivedayet /
K12bsu041_u:18434: pañcagavyena kāyaśodhanaṃ kṛtvā śuklapratipadamārabhya yāvat pūrṇamāsīti kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ
K12bsu041_u:18435: ante trirātroṣitaḥ kumārīkartitasūtraṃ gṛhya sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāṃ vā gṛhe
K12bsu041_u:18437: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya padmānāṃ triṃśatsahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18441: / trirātroṣitaḥ sadhātuke caitye udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udumbarībhiḥ samidhābhiḥ agniṃ prajvālya ghṛtāhutiṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18444: pratidinamekaikasya stūpasya gandhapuṣpadhūpādīṃ datvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kārayet /
K12bsu041_u:18450: sa yaṃ varaṃ yācate taṃ labhate /
K12bsu041_u:18453: aṭavīṃ gatvā bhikṣāhāraḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ araṇyagomayānāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18463: agarukāṣṭhapratimāgrataḥ bhagavataḥ vatsalaṇḍakānāṃ madhughṛtāktānāṃ saptasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18465: yadi nāgacchati punarapi vatsalaṇḍaṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18470: vikasitapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt sadhātuke caitye buddhābhiprasannā devatā varadā bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18471: āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ saptābhimantritānāṃ saṅgrāme prakire /
K12bsu041_u:18473: pratihārakapakṣe śuklatrayodaśyāṃ gandhapuṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vikasitānāṃ padmānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18474: bhasmaṃ ca gṛhītvātmanaḥ lalāṭe tilakaṃ kṛtvā grāmaṃ nagaraṃ praviśet /
K12bsu041_u:18476: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ prabhṛti yāvat pañcadaśīti ekarātroṣitena vṛkṣa syādhastāccaturhastamātraṃ maṇḍalakamupalipya,
K12bsu041_u:18477: gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ datvā āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā yakṣāṇāṃ baliṃ datvā mānuṣāsthiṃ gṛhītvā triśūlaṃ kārayet /
K12bsu041_u:18478: vāmahastena prakṣipya saptarātratrirātroṣitena vā jātīpuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18482: divyaṃ gṛhaṃ candrasūryagrahe sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāṃ vā gṛhe kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ
K12bsu041_u:18483: goghṛtapalaṃ gṛhya sauvarṇabhājane sthāpya bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā candramapaśyatā (Vaidya 528)
K12bsu041_u:18491: pratihārakapakṣamārabhya saṃvatsaraṃ bhagavato āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpādīnāṃ dadatā aṣṭāṅgapoṣadhasamanvāgatena pūrṇe saṃvatsare siddho bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18493: āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā pratipadamārabhya yāvat paurṇamāsī dine dine 'dhikapūjā kāryā /
K12bsu041_u:18498: prātihārakapakṣe bhagavato buddhasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ āryamañjuśriyasya gandhapuṣpadīpadhūpādīn datvā śaṅkhapuṣpīpuṣpāṇāṃ iṅgudatailāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18500: saptarātraṃ kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ poṣadhikena āmalitaghṛtena pātraṃ pūrayitvā śuklavarttinā dīpaṃ prajvālya kumārakumārikānāṃ darśāpayet /
K12bsu041_u:18509: gandhapuṣpadhūpādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ante trirātroṣitena maunavrataṃ kurutā mantraṃ japatā prāticārakebhyo baliṃ haste datvā mahāpathaṃ gatvā bhūtaṃ krūraṃ nivedayet /
K12bsu041_u:18511: gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ droṇaṃ gṛhītvā daśa diśo 'dhastācca kṣipet /
K12bsu041_u:18513: tathaiva kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ gandhakuṭiṃ praviśya bhagavato 'grataḥ sahasraṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:18514: gandhapuṣpādibhirbalividhānaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ svapne paśyati bhagavānāryamañjuśrīḥ /
K12bsu041_u:18515: vasiśākhamāse kṛṣṇapakṣe poṣadhikena kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ sadhātuke caitye gandhapuṣpadīpādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhikṣavaśca dine dine bhojayitavyāḥ
K12bsu041_u:18517: sarvauṣadhibījāni prakṣipya rātrau ekaikamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā akākolīne putradāradārikāṃ sthāpayet /
K12bsu041_u:18519: pakṣābhyantarayoḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ bhagavataḥ āryamañjuśriyasya ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā śmaśānāgniṃ prajvālya śatapuṣpāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18521: tameva bhasmaṃ grahāya ātmanaḥ parasya vā lalāṭe puṇḍrakaṃ kṛtvā saṅgāme 'vataret sarve vaśā bhavanti /
K12bsu041_u:18528: yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18529: pañcakālakānāṃ trisandhyaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18530: prātihārakapakṣe paṭasyāgrataḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ trisandhyaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ tāvajjaped yāvad bhagavānāgacchati /
K12bsu041_u:18538: caitye bhagavataḥ āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ ṣaṇmāsābhyantareṇa dīnārāṇāṃ pañcasahasrāṇi labhati /
K12bsu041_u:18539: sadhātuke caitye pūjāṃ kṛtvā śatasahasraṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:18549: sadhātuke caitye śuklapratipadamārabhya pañcadaśyāṃ trirātroṣitena udumbarakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya rājasarṣapāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18553: pañcadaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ yadi te tilā diśi vidiśaṃ gacchanti /
K12bsu041_u:18557: tataḥ candragrahe ghṛtamaṣṭapalāni datvā tāvajjaped yāvat phenāyati pītvā śrutidharo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18566: tena bhasmanā tilakaṃ kuryād antarhito bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18568: candragrahe nadītīraṃ gatvā bilvasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya bilvapuṣpāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18570: ardharātre punarapi aṣṭasahasraṃ japitvā tata ekā āgacchati /
K12bsu041_u:18572: nidhisthāne mantramaṣṭasahasraṃ japet puṣpadhūpagandhādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ balividhānaṃ kṛtvā japet /
K12bsu041_u:18578: bhagavato 'grataḥ vibhītakakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya tilataṇḍulānāṃ pratidivasaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18584: agastikāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya dīpavartīnāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ dīnāraśataṃ labhate /
K12bsu041_u:18593: bodhivṛkṣamūle bhagavataḥ āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā apāmārgasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18596: sapta sapta maricāni abhimantrya akākolīne bhakṣayet /
K12bsu041_u:18598: tacca yāvajjīvaṃ dhārayati bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ śatasahasraṃ japaṃ kṛtvā pannagabandhaṃ karoti /
K12bsu041_u:18600: ardharātre pañca dīnāraśatāni pratilabhate ardhaṃ ratnatrayopayojyam /
K12bsu041_u:18603: kārttikaśuklapakṣe kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ śākāhāro vā poṣadhikaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ trirātroṣito vaikaṅkataphalānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18607: śucau bhūpradeśe gocarmamātraṃ maṇḍalamupalipya tanmadhye padmākārāṃ vediṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpadhūpavicitrabaliṃ kṛtvā vaikaṅkatasamidhānā sugatavitastipramāṇānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18615: yadi na paśyati na sidhyati ekavārāhiṃ gatvā gandhapuṣpadhūpabalividhānaṃ kṛtvā sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:18622: palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya araṇyagomayānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18626: sa vaktavyaḥ - mama dine dine dīnāramekaṃ dehi /
K12bsu041_u:18629: bhagavataḥ pādau spṛśeti vaktavyaḥ tataḥ siddho bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18630: athavā na dadādi bilvaphalānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ sadhātuke caitye paṭasyāgrataḥ ekarātroṣitaḥ vaikaṅkatasamidhāgniṃ prajvālya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18638: puṣṭimicchatā kṣīravṛkṣasamidhānāmagniṃ prajvālya trisandhyaṃ tilataṇḍulānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18643: astamite vrīhituṣāṇāṃ nāma gṛhītvā vāmahastena juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18645: rājasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya tilataṇḍulānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18647: gaṅgāyāmusalaśabdarahite śucau pradeśe ubhayakūlamṛttikāṃ gṛhya sacaturasrāṃ saptahastāṃ
K12bsu041_u:18648: vedikāṃ kṛtvā madhye sahasrapatraṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā tasyopari sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ pañcalohitakaṃ
K12bsu041_u:18649: cakraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya maṇḍalamadhye paṭasyāgrataḥ sādhayitavya gandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetacandanairarcayitvā
K12bsu041_u:18650: mandārakaraktapuṣpamālāṃ datvā tato gandhādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpamālā sapta
K12bsu041_u:18652: caturdiśaṃ catvāraḥ kalaśāḥ sarvabījapūrṇakā ratnāni ca prakṣipya sthāpayitavyā /
K12bsu041_u:18654: balividhānaṃ kṛtvā caturdiśaṃ pūrvoktena dadhibhakto 'pūpakaṃ deyam /
K12bsu041_u:18659: tataḥ palāśasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya apāmārgasamidhānāṃ saptābhimantritānāṃ ghṛtānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18662: rājavṛkṣasamidbhirigniṃ prajvālya lavaṇamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śirādārabhya ekaikāmāhutiṃ saptābhimantritāṃ yāvaccaraṇāviti nāmaṃ grahāya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18665: sadhātuke caitye āryamañjuśriyasya rajatamaye vā bhājane kapilāyāḥ goḥ samānavatsāyāḥ
K12bsu041_u:18666: kumārīmathitaṃ navanītaṃ gṛhya kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vāmahastena bhājanaṃ gṛhyaṃ dakṣiṇahastenānāmikāyāmaṅguhyā
K12bsu041_u:18676: aṣṭaśatābhimantritāṃ vācāṃ dakṣiṇahaste badhvā yāvat sarvatrottaravādī bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18681: dāruṇena sarpeṇa daṣṭasya nāmaṃ grahāya saptābhimantritamudakacūrṇakaṃ pānāya deyam /
K12bsu041_u:18688: māryupadrave nagaramadhye vā ardharātrau sthaṇḍilakamupalipya śuklaṃ baliṃ kṛtvā kṣīravṛkṣasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya kṣīrāhutisahasraṃ juhuyāt
K12bsu041_u:18691: tato 'nyatamasmin divase madhyāhnavelāyāṃ śleṣmātakasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya siddhārthānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18693: anena vidhinā kṛtena viṣamabandhaḥ yāvantaḥ sattvā te tasya vaśā bhavanti /
K12bsu041_u:18706: vīrakrayakrītāṃ manaḥśilāṃ gṛhītvārājavṛkṣasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālyaṃ tāvajjaped yāvadagnivarṇā bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18707: tataḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goḥ kapilāyāḥ kanyāmathitena navanītena kṛtvā tasmiṃ ghṛte nirvāpayet /
K12bsu041_u:18709: tataḥ anenaiva rakṣāṃ kṛtvā samudgake sthāpya candragrahe trirātroṣitena sadhātuke
K12bsu041_u:18710: caitye āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā uttarāmukhenāśvatthapatracatuṣṭaye sthāpya
K12bsu041_u:18715: rocanayā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - śuklapañcadaśyāṃ padmapatre sthāpya āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ karasampuṭena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ
K12bsu041_u:18717: saptarātraṃ pañcalohena padmaṃ kṛtvā kuṅkumarocanakarpūramudake piṣṭvā padmaṃ mrakṣayitvā
K12bsu041_u:18718: tataḥ śuklāṣṭamyāmupoṣadhikena triḥkālasnāyinā śucivastraprāvṛtena sadhātuke caitye
K12bsu041_u:18719: āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ dakṣiṇena hastena gṛhītena tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalati /
K12bsu041_u:18723: evaṃ śailaraktacandanaṃ guggulaṃ nandyāvartamūlaṃ girikarṇikātuṣaṃ vrīhikuṣṭhatagaraṃ madhu pippalī turuṣkaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā samabhāgāni kārayet
K12bsu041_u:18724: tataḥ kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goḥ kṣīraṃ gṛhya kanyāmathitena navanītena modayitvā gulikāṃ kārayet /
K12bsu041_u:18726: tata upoṣadhikena śuklacaturdaśyāmahorātropitaḥ aśvatthapatrāntaritā gulikāṃ kṛtvā āryamañjuśriyasyāgratastāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati /
K12bsu041_u:18731: sadhātuke caitye paṭasyāgrataḥ poṣadhikenodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā arkasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ khadirasamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18737: atha rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā rājavṛkṣasamidhānāṃ iṅgudatailāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18740: caturvarṇaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ pāyasaṃ haviṣyānnamānīya peyakrasarā ceti juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18744: krodhamupaśamanaṃ piṇḍakatuṣahomena vā kanyāvaśīkaraṇe tilāṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18746: aṣṭasahasraṃ saptarātraṃ vacāṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā haste badhvā yaṃ yācayati taṃ labhate /
K12bsu041_u:18747: nityajāpena pratyaṅgirā padmasūtrādinā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritena yasya haste badhnāti tasya rakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18749: saptarātram kulapatikāmaḥ gandhāṃ juhuyāt saptarātam dhṛtāktāṃ /
K12bsu041_u:18751: puṣpamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ yasya dadāti sa vaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18753: rājadvāre vastraya mālabhaṃ strīpuruṣaprayuktavaśīkaraṇaṃ yuddhavijayakaraṇam dhvajamaṣṭasahasravārāṃ
K12bsu041_u:18754: parijapya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ cābhimantrayitvā sapta dadhikuṇḍeṣu ardhyaṃ visajayet /
K12bsu041_u:18756: kṛṣṇatilāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yasya nāmaṃ grahāya bhakṣayati savaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18757: aṣṭasahasrajaptā sarvabījāni sarvauṣadhyaḥ sarvagandhāni ca surabhipuṣpāṇi padmaṃ vā sarvāṇi akālamūlakalaśe prakṣipya,
K12bsu041_u:18762: padmaṃ vā padmapatraṃ vā nirdhūmeṣu aṅgāreṣu yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:18779: prabhṛti vikasitānāṃ śvetapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18840: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ rātrau divasaṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18848: paṭasyāgrataḥ gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ vā kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ padmaṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18855: paṭasyāgrato dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ /
K12bsu041_u:18874: viṣayamapi labhate paṭasyāgrata ādhārako 'gnimupasamādhāya pratidinaṃ varddhamānā pūjā kāryā /
K12bsu041_u:18942: vidyādharamantardhānaṃ vā pādapracārikaṃ vā śrutidharatvaṃ dadāti /
K12bsu041_u:18943: atha gulikāṃ sādhayitukāmena karṇikārakesaraṃ nāgakesaraṃ śvetacandanaṃ gajamadaṃ cekīkṛtya,
K12bsu041_u:18978: ātmanaḥ śāntiṃ karttukāmena trisandhyaṃ kṣīraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:18980: mahādevasya dakṣiṇāṃ mūrttiṃ tāmrabhājane ghṛtaṃ sthāpya,
K12bsu041_u:18988: rajate vā tāmre vā ghṛtaṃ sthāpya,
K12bsu041_u:18998: ayantrita ātmanaḥ sakhāyānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped,
K12bsu041_u:19035: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmahorātroṣitena kapilāyā goḥ samānavatsāyā apatitagomayenāryamañjuśriyaṃ kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:19077: śvetārkasyādhastādāryamañjuśriyasya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca datvā mālyaṃ cāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:19082: tasyā mṛttikayā pūrvakṛtaṃ pratimāmudramarkakṣīreṇa pratimudrāṃ kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:19084: yāvadaṣṭamīti triḥ kālaṃ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā baliṃ dadyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19092: arthamutpādayitukāmena goṣṭaṃ gatvā kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ parebhyaḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāro lakṣaṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:19093: aparasmiṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ te tato 'horātroṣitena tatraiva śatasahasraṃ japtavyam /
K12bsu041_u:19113: evaṃ dine dine gandhādīn dattvā yāvadaṣṭottaraṃ stūpasahasraṃ pūrṇamiti paṭṭabandhamavāpnoti tilānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19118: āpyāyanaṃ karttukāmo bhagavato 'grataḥ kṣīravṛkṣasamidhānāṃ ghṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19145: sā ced vidyā sādhyamānā na siddhyati;
K12bsu041_u:19146: tāmanena mantreṇa sametaṃ bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ paṭasya ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:19159: atha śāntiṃ kartukāmaḥ bhagavato 'grataḥ kṣīrāhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ gandhodakena vābhyukṣayet /
K12bsu041_u:19163: valmīkaśikharamāruhya nirāhāra ekapāda pūrvāhnād yāvadaparāhṇaṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:19180: evaṃ vaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇayorekatareṇa trirātroṣitaḥ kṛtarakṣaḥ suyantritaḥ paṭasyāgrato nirdhūmāṅgārairguggulugulikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19221: saptajaptena śvetapuṣpeṇa gugguludhūpena vā grahagṛhītānāṃ snāpayata /
K12bsu041_u:19226: sadhātuke caitye pūrṇamāsyāṃ sagauraveṇa maṇḍalakamupalipyāṣṭau pūrṇakalaśā aṣṭau ca puṣpamālāgaruturuṣkacandanakundurudhūpaṃ duhatā tāvajjapet
K12bsu041_u:19228: sadhātuke caitye kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ yathāvi bhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śatasahasraṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:19232: vaśīkaraṇaṃ antardhānaḥ śilādiṣu prayogeṣu susamartho bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:19240: tilahomena naranārīvaśīkaraṇaṃ viśitavikrayena rakṣā ātmarakṣā pararakṣā,
K12bsu041_u:19242: yuddhe rājakule vivāda japamānasya vijayo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:19243: ātmanā abhiṣekaṃ karttukāmaścatvāraḥ kalaśā akālanadīpalvalaprasravaṇodake vā sarvagandhavījāni prakṣipya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāni kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:19262: sahasrasampātāhutiṃ bhagavato 'grataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:19285: sarvamudrā bhedabhasmanā bhogārthī nadīsaṅgame taḍāgānāmekatame 'nyatra vā śucipradeśe paṭaṃ (Vaidya 539)
K12bsu041_u:19333: prātarvelākāle tato bhojane prathamamālāpaṃ trayo vārāṃ parijapya bhoktavyam /
K12bsu041_u:19338: evaṃ divasāni sapta udakaṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya,
K12bsu041_u:19347: trayo vārāṃ cīvarakarṇakaṃ parijapya cīvarakarṇikaṃ bandhitavyam /
K12bsu041_u:19360: sarvasattvā stambhanaṃ manasīkaraṇe śuklapūrṇamābhyāṃ paṭasyāgrato bodhivṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya,
K12bsu041_u:19394: raktasūtreṇa pariveṣṭya śarāvasampuṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:19407: pūrṇapūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ poṣadhikaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19412: ante trirātropitaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyā pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
K12bsu041_u:19434: madanaputtalikāṃ sarvālaṅkāropetāṃ rājavṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śalākayā viddhā tāpayet /
K12bsu041_u:19459: divasāni sapta jvarapreṣaṇaṃ bhūtapreṣaṇaṃ ātmarakṣā vetāḍotthāpanaṃ bilapraveśaṃ vanapraveśaṃ rakṣā sīmābandhaḥ diśābandhaḥ coravyāghraḍākinīnāṃ jāpena stambhitā bhavatīti /
K12bsu041_u:19463: tataḥ śatapuṣpāyā vīrakraye krītvā dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19471: marīcaphalaṃ saptavārānabhimantrya mukhe prakṣipya yasya alāpaṃ dadāti /
K12bsu041_u:19473: sadhātuke caitye buddhapratimāyā agrataḥ kṛtvā udake kṣipet /
K12bsu041_u:19478: puṣpeṇa phalena vā lakṣajaptena maśakā na bhavanti /
K12bsu041_u:19480: rājadvārikaṃ dantakāṣṭhabhakṣaṇaṃ phaladānaṃ gandhadānaṃ bhūmibandhaṃ corabandhaṃ
K12bsu041_u:19482: viṣomārjanaṃ viṣasaṅkramaṇaṃ viṣabandhaḥ bhūtavaśīkaraṇaṃ ḍākinīgrahamokṣaṇaṃ naṣṭavidyāyā
K12bsu041_u:19483: gorocanayā bhūrjapatre likhitvā bhagavato 'grataḥ sadhātuke caitye śatavārāṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:19485: saptajaptvā siddhārthakāṃ grāme vā nagare vā kṣipet /
K12bsu041_u:19489: striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo yasya yato bhāge gṛham;
K12bsu041_u:19494: oṣadhabandhaṃ manasā nidhānabandhaṃ khadirakīlakairekaviṃśatisaptanidhānasthāneṣu caturṣu koṇeṣu nikhanet /
K12bsu041_u:19496: candragrahe bhikṣuṇā śrāvayitavyāḥ sarvairetaiḥ kalpasthāyī brahmacāryapratihatagatiryatheṣṭaṃ vicarati /
K12bsu041_u:19530: tataḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ candagrahe vā sarvakāmikāṃ baliṃ datvā,
K12bsu041_u:19550: raktacandanamayaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ dvādaśāṅgulaṃ vā poṣadhikena karmakāreṇa daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kārayet /
K12bsu041_u:19566: rājā vā rājamātro vā vaśī bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:19567: kṣīrāhāraḥ śākāhāro vā poṣadhikaḥ sadhātuke caitye lakṣatrayaṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:19582: surabhipuṣpāṃ jalajāni vā sthalajāni vā sugandhī nivedyaṃ vā gāvyaghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ ca /
K12bsu041_u:19599: strīvaśyārthaṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ lalāṭāṃ madhvāktānāmekaviṃśati āhutī juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptarātram /
K12bsu041_u:19658: vidyādharatvaṃ rājyamathavā yādṛśo bhagavān tādṛśo bhavāmi /
K12bsu041_u:19659: eṣā siddhiḥ kāruṇikena sarvasattvānāṃ nirāmiṣacittena dānaṃ dadatā sidhyati /
K12bsu041_u:19667: tena samālabdhagātraḥ saṅgrāme dūte aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19674: triḥ kālasnāyī payobhakṣaḥ mūlapaṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭaśatiko japo deyaḥ /
K12bsu041_u:19675: paścādaṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ yathāśaktya pūjāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vilvasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt
K12bsu041_u:19682: paṭasyāgrataḥ śvetacandanena maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gandhadhūpapuṣpabalivilepanaṃ ca datvā
K12bsu041_u:19683: keśarapuṣpāṇāṃ śatatrayaṃ gṛhītvā aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ ghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ prajvālya
K12bsu041_u:19684: udumbassamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya ekaikaṃ puṣpamaṣṭaśatabhimantritaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtābhyaktānāṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:19686: yaḥ trikālaṃ parivartayati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi tanvībhavanti /
K12bsu041_u:19689: cakṣuṣāṃ yaṃ paśyati sa vaśo bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:19695: āryamañjuśriyaṃ pūrvoktena vidhānena paṭake phaleka vā aśleṣakairvarṇaiścitrāpayitavyaḥ /
K12bsu041_u:19697: kuśasaṃstaraśāyī kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ triḥkālasnāyī śucivastraprāvṛtenāṣṭāṅgapoṣadhikena pratipadamārabhya japo deyaḥ yāvat pañcadaśīti /
K12bsu041_u:19700: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṣīragomūtrāhāraḥ yāvakāhāro vā triḥkālasnāyī poṣadhikaḥ sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratidinaṃ ghṛtapradīpo prajvālayitavyaḥ

K12bsu041_u:20032: pratiṣṭhāpya śuklāṣṭamyāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saptāśvatthapatreṣu sthāpya maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā
K12bsu041_u:20033: tasya madhye akṣatāṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ sthāpya vāmapādena urasi mākramya kṛtarakṣaḥ mantramāvartayet /

K12bsu041_u:20068: vetasapatraiḥ kaṭukatailāktaiḥ māmupaśamaḥ śālitandulena parvatasampattiḥ lakṣajaptaiḥ sarṣapaiḥ āsurāṇi mantrāṇi ghātayati /

K12bsu041_u:20085: caityaṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikaḥ śuciḥ yathāśaktitaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāhāraḥ haviṣyāhāro

K12bsu041_u:20104: yatra sthāne vidhānaḥ tatra gatvā upavasitaḥ maṇḍalakamupalipya bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ
K12bsu041_u:20107: rājamahiṣī saparivārāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ kuśamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā vāmahastenāvaṣṭabhya sahasraṃ japet /

K12bsu041_u:20135: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ ārabhya yāvacchuklacaturdaśīti dīnārāṇāṃ sahasraṃ labhate dine dine aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /

K12bsu041_u:20229: pūrvaśiraṃ sthāpya śuklapaṭapracchāditasādhakaḥ śuklavāsasasakhāyaḥ diśāpālāṃ sthāpayet /

K12bsu041_u:20233: gṛhya aśvatthapatrāntaritāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiriti ūṣmāyati dhūmāyati jvalati /
K12bsu041_u:20238: sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ prabhuḥ kalpasthāyī upamupari lakṣaṃ japamānaḥ pañcābhijño bhavati /
K12bsu041_u:20245: sarvagrahamudrayā vācayā sandeśena rocanayā agniṃ stambhayati /

K12bsu041_u:20301: aśītivarṣasahasrāṇi kṛtapuruścaraṇaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ trirātroṣitaḥ sadhātuke

K12bsu041_u:20366: manaḥśilā haritālaṃ daṃśarocanā samīkṛtya paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahāsrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā bodhivṛkṣakāṣṭhapatrai sthāpya japet /
K12bsu041_u:20383: añjanaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ sauvīrāñjanaṃ palaṃ gṛhya agninā sa gandhaṃ kṛtvā añjanāparikarma śodhayitvā candragrahe udakaṃ praviśya tāvajjaped yāvat kūṣmāṇḍo bhavati /

K12bsu041_u:20408: asādhyamānāyāḥ kṣīrasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya vidyānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:20417: kṛṣṇavrīhi yasyoddiśya parijapya hūyate sa vaśyo bhavati /

K12bsu041_u:20434: udumbarakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vāṣakasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /

K12bsu041_u:20470: poṣadhikaḥ pañcagulikāṃ kṛtvā āgarumaye samudgake prakṣipya śvetasiddhārthakasahitānāṃ

K12bsu041_u:20480: śāntiṃ kartukāmena yājñikaiḥ samidbhiragniṃ prajvālya paramānnamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trirātram /
K12bsu041_u:20482: ātmanaḥ parasya vā saptarātreṇa grāmasya nagarasyānāvṛṣṭau trimadhuraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:20489: vā candanena maṇḍalakamupalipya ghṛtamadhu āmalakīrasaṃ samabhāgāni tāmrabhājane sthāpya paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati /
K12bsu041_u:20491: poṣadhiko vikāle udakaculakaṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya pātavyam /
K12bsu041_u:20493: śvetavacāṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya mukhe dantāntare prakṣipya yaṃ yācati taṃ labhate /
K12bsu041_u:20495: yaṃ yameva bhāvaṃ manasi kṛtvā japati taṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ puṣpagandhādīn dattvā diśābaliṃ ca caturdiśaṃ kṣipet /
K12bsu041_u:20498: valmīkamṛttikayā siṃhaṃ kṛtvā gorocanayā samālabhya paṭasyāgrataḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ piṇḍakāṃ kṛtvā sthāpya lakṣatrayaṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:20505: sarvavrīhigandhodakakalaśaṃ paripūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ āmrapallavamukhapracchāditaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritena vināyakaṃ snāpaya /
K12bsu041_u:20513: mahāsāmantavaśīkaraṇe paṭasyāgrataḥ arkasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātraṃ trisandhyam /
K12bsu041_u:20515: rājakanyāyai priyaṅgukusumānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptāhā yasya dīyate /
K12bsu041_u:20518: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitye lakṣaṃ japte bhikṣāhāraḥ /
K12bsu041_u:20519: tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ekarātroṣitaḥ paṭasya yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇatilānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:20523: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ nadītaṭe paścābhimukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udakasaktavāhāraḥ yathāvibhavataḥ
K12bsu041_u:20524: pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpāṃ ekaviṃśatipradīpāṃ prajvālya bahiḥ sārvabhūtikāḥ baliṃ
K12bsu041_u:20525: nivedya paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvadaruṇo devaputra āgacchati /
K12bsu041_u:20528: tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ gocarmamātraṃ sthaṇḍilakamupalipya sarvarasikaṃ baliṃ nivedyam /
K12bsu041_u:20529: bahiḥ sarvabhūtikaṃ baliṃ dattvā tataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ nirdhūmāṅgāreṣu guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
K12bsu041_u:20532: sā bravīti kiṃ karomīti mātā bhaginī sakhī eṣāmekatamaṃ grāhyam /
K12bsu041_u:20536: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitye yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā triḥkālasnāyī tṛsandhyaṃ ṣaṇmāsāṃ aparimito jāpaḥ /
K12bsu041_u:20539: kṛṣṇapakṣe puṣyanakṣatre karavīrikāṃ manaḥśilāṃ vīrakrayakrītāṃ gṛhya pañcagavyena
K12bsu041_u:20540: saṃśodhya brāhmaṇakanyāṃ vāmoṣadhaṃ dattvā snānālaṅkṛtāṃ kṛtvā pūrvābhimukhe praviśya
K12bsu041_u:20542: anāmikāṅgulyā viṣamāṃ badarāsthipramāṇāṃ gulikāṃ kṛtvā aśvatthasamudgake prakṣipya
K12bsu041_u:20543: paṭasyāgrataḥ sahasrasampātābhihutaṃ kṛtvā saptarātroṣitaṃ ca ante śuklapakṣe udārāṃ
K12bsu041_u:20545: nivedya gandhapuṣpadhūpārcitaṃ samudgakaṃ kṛtvā caturbhiraśvatthapatrai sthāpya tribhirācchādya hastenāvaṣṭabhya sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ namaskāraṃ kṛtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ
K12bsu041_u:20558: vastrakarṇake mṛṇmayīṃ mudrāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantrya daṣṭakopari sthāpayitvā ākarṣayet /
K12bsu041_u:20560: dravyāṇāṃ ca manaḥśilādīnāṃ khaḍgacakramusuṇḍyādīnāṃ pañcagavyena śodhayitvā sahasrasampātāhutiṃ
K12bsu041_u:20561: kṛtvā anyatamaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhya pūrṇamāsyāṃ sādhanamaṇḍalaṃ likhya vastropari dravyaṃ
K12bsu041_u:20563: phalake yamicchati dravyaṃ tasya tasya nāmaṃ likhya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yatra nāgastiṣṭhati tatra hrade kṣeptavyā /
K12bsu041_u:20566: kūpe hrade vābhilaṣitavyaṃ nāmaṃ likhya dravyādīnāṃ phalake tathaiva hrade kṣeptavyam /
K12bsu041_u:20571: nadīsantārakādau daśaṣu ca sabhāyāṃ rājakule vā vivāde vā smartavyam /
K12bsu041_u:20573: yamicchati vaśaṃ kartum tasya mukhe āryamañjuśriyaṃ dhyātvā kiñcit sambhāṣaṇaṃ kuryāt /
K12bsu041_u:20578: tatroktena vidhānena maṇḍalaṃ praviṣṭa sampūrṇasya vṛṣasya apatitagomayaṃ gṛhya haviṣyāhāraḥ samaunī maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tāvajjapet paurṇamāsyāṃ ārabhya yāvat tṛtīyamapi lakṣaṃ japet /
K12bsu041_u:20587: svasti śrīrājamaṅgalakāvasthitena mārgaśīrṣaśuklā + + + padānakṣatre siṃhasthe 'pi gurau mañjuśrīkalpaṃ samāptamiti /
K12bsu041_u:20588: śrīmūlaghoṣavihārādhipatinā śrībo + + + madhyadeśād vinirgatena paṇḍitaravicandreṇa likhitamiti / + +
